scripts.init-env: composer run pre-install-cmd && composer require humbug/php-scoper:0.17.7
scripts.build: composer install --no-dev  && composer run prefixer && composer run clear
scripts.prefixer: rm -rf vendor_prefixed && vendor/bin/php-scoper add-prefix --output-dir vendor_prefixed && find vendor/* -type d ! -name "composer" -exec rm -rf {} + && composer dump-autoload
scripts.clear: rm -rf vendor_prefixed/jetbrains && rm -rf vendor_prefixed/humbug  && rm -rf vendor_prefixed/nikic  && rm -rf vendor_prefixed/thecodingmachine
scripts.tests: composer install && composer phpcs-fix && composer phpcs && composer phpstan
scripts.all: composer run pre-install-cmd && composer run build && composer run tests
